root.name: Lemmings 3D
root.description: OverviewThe gameplay of Lemmings 3D is similar to that of the original two Lemmings games; however, the game includes the ability to turn at 90 degree angles. There are also several other new 3D features; splitter blocks, which split a line of lemmings left or right; different cameras which can be used to view levels from different angles; and the ability to see things through the eyes of the lemmings themselves in first-person.
